factText: Mandatory evacuations have been rescinded for Martin County that were supposed to take effect Sunday at 10 a.m. Brevard County Emergency Management officials have announced a 24-hour delay in mandatory evacuations, and are now calling for evacuations to begin at 8 a.m. Monday. Evacuation orders are expected over the weekend. Evacuations The mandatory evacuation order has been rescinded.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-014_general_Are evacuation orders still in place or have they been lifted?

factText: Disaster relief efforts will likely shift to focus on the Bahamas, where “catastrophic” conditions are now predicted.
